pages.text: The Buddysteel knife is unlike other knifes. It gets sharper as you collect more buddycards. It'll always chop the same though
It's quite a nice tool to have, but I'd personally save my Buddysteel for better gear.

pages.title: Enchantments
pages.text: Other than enchantments you can normally get on knives, you can also get Buddy Binding on a Buddysteel knife.
